Package Pacman

Class Case

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pacman.Drawable
      • Pacman.Case
  • public class Case
extends Drawable
    The class Case represents a square on the board. Every single Case is either Walkable or not A Case possesses a location on the board and can also possess a BonusEntity, a Fantome or a Pac_Man
    Author:
    Nicolas FONNIER, Henri GLEVEAU

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Main constructor for Case objects.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Case

        public Case​(boolean walkable,
            BonusEntity bonus,
            Pac_Man pacman,
            Fantome fantome,
            int x,
            int y)
        Main constructor for Case objects.
        Parameters:
        walkable - To put a Case walkable or not
        bonus - To put a bonus on a Case
        pacman - To put a pacman on a Case
        fantome - To put a ghost on a Case
        x - Location x of the Case
        y - Location y of the case

    • Method Detail

      • isWalkable

        public boolean isWalkable()
        Returns the walkable boolean
        Returns:
        true if the square has been set as walkable, false else

      • getBonus

        public BonusEntity getBonus()
        Return the bonusEntity on the square
        Returns:
        The bonusEntity currently on the square.

      • setBonus

        public void setBonus​(BonusEntity bonus)
        Changes the bonus on the square.
        Parameters:
        bonus - the bonus to set on the square

      • getPacMan

        public Pac_Man getPacMan()
        Return the Pacman on the square, which should be the only Pacman in the game TODO: ADD INVARIANT CHECK?
        Returns:
        The Pacman on the square

      • setPacMan

        public void setPacMan​(Pac_Man pacman)
        Changes the Pacman of the square
        Parameters:
        pacman - The new Pacman. Beware only one Pacman is allowed in the game!

      • getFantome

        public Fantome getFantome()
        Returns the ghost on the square
        Returns:

        public void setFantome​(Fantome fantome)
